title: 怎么解决
txt_content:
Could not connect to a default or fallback server, please try again later: io.netty.channel.AbstractChannel$AnnotatedConnectException


这是什么意思

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1451772136 发表于 2020-1-11 18:32
看看哪有错
这个服务器开启了吗
  lobby:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:17000
    restricted: false

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
检查你 bc 的子服是否开启，是否能被 bc 连接。

检查 bc 的默认服务器设置是否正确

connection_throttle_limit: 3
timeout: 30000
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
network_compression_threshold: 256
listeners:
- query_port: 12000
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  max_players: 10000
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
connection_throttle: 4000
groups:
  HTL9257:
  - admin
log_pings: true
ip_forward: true
prevent_proxy_connections: false
forge_support: true
inject_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
stats: 88c4072e-bbf5-46ff-848d-df0bf955e029
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - skinsrestorer.playercmds
  admin:
  - skinsrestorer.cmds

    restricted: false
